short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly capitalise the text on every web page. Why? Why not?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Randomly Capitalises text on a web page.
Why?
Why not.
Because I can.
Because if you install it on someone else's browser it will drive them nuts.
